TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: ɪ s k ɑː z ɛ l æ s k ɚ t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ɪ θ ɪ ŋ z w ɪ ð h ɚ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s ɪ s p ɔːɹ n z ʌ v ɹ aɪ ʃ ᵻ s n t iː z f æ ɪ ɡ ɐ s l æ s ʌ v b uː ʃ iː s æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s m aɪ k ɹ ɔː b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɔː w ɪ ɔː l s oʊ m eɪ t ɐ s m ɔː p l æ s ɪ k s m aɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t ɑː l p ɹ ɑː ɡ ɔː ð ə k iː z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː b ð ɪ s ð ɪ ŋ z ɪ ŋ t ə θ ɹ iː ɹ aɪ t f æ k s æ n d w oʊ ɡ oʊ m eɪ ɡ h ɚ ɹ ə n s t eɪ æ t h ə t ɹ iː t n s t eɪ ʃ ə n

SNACK INCONTEXT: s-ma

BAGS INCONTEXT: fæks
BAGS NOCONTEXT: pai
